CustomField.description: Color to Indicate if Opportunity is passed its closed date
CustomField.formula: IF( !OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Closed Won'),ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Closed Lost')), IF( TODAY() > CloseDate , 'RED', 'GREEN'),'')
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field indicates if an Open Opportunity is past its closed date.
CustomField.label: Color Indicator
